name: Free Online Image to PDF Converter - ATools
description: Free online image to PDF converter: Supports multi-image merging, sorting, A4/Letter/custom sizes, DPI and margin settings, pure frontend local generation.
seoDescription: Free online image to PDF converter that supports uploading multiple images and merging them into a single PDF, provides image sorting, A4/Letter paper selection, fit modes (contain/cover), margin and background color settings, and supports generating pages based on image dimensions combined with DPI. Pure frontend local operation without image uploads, suitable for scanned document merging, photo album export, and document archiving.
